name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Just now, Shanghai announced the resumption of online ride-hailing services at Pudong Airport. 
Previously, the Shanghai Municipal Road Transport Administration announced on January 29 that online ride-hailing services would be strictly prohibited from picking up passengers in the Pudong Airport area during the Spring Festival travel season.

content: Currently, the number of comments has reached 86,000. Today, the top-ranked comments have been deleted continuously, but at the same time, new top-ranked comments have been pushed to the top by people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 2, a video of a man who was suspected of not letting a girl get off the bus at Linchuan East Service Area in Fuzhou, Jiangxi Province, attracted attention. The video shows a man holding the woman tightly and shouting: This is my daughter. The woman kept struggling.
According to the Beijing News on February 3, the service area staff said that they called the police at the time. The traffic police sent one of the girls to the station and contacted her father to send her back to Fujian. The man's whereabouts are unknown. At present, both girls have returned home.
Local highway traffic police staff said that they had seen the video circulated on the Internet, but they were not convenient to disclose the man involved.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 4, a CSGO anchor said that he was banned for a year because he accidentally read the name of the opponent player during the live broadcast.
The screenshot shows that the ID of three players on the opposite side is "Xu Jingbin" (homonymous with Xi Jinping)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the anchor has been unblocked

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 3, due to the low temperature, rain, snow and freezing weather, many trains on Wuhan Railway were delayed. In the early morning of the 3rd, the D630 train from Chongqing North to Hankou had a power failure, causing the train to stop running for several hours.
According to the passenger who filmed the video, the train has been stagnant for nearly seven hours, and there is currently no water, electricity or heating. It was not restored until the morning.

content:
On February 4, staff from the Zhangjiajie Yongding District People's Government responded that there were no casualties in the collapse of the 72 Qilou. 
They were slapped in the face by the injured's family in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 4, the canteen of Yangtze University collapsed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 4, CCTV reported that during Xi Jinping's inspection tour in Tianjin, a child presented Xi Jinping with "immortality fruit".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 2, a New York Times reporter asked the Foreign Ministry spokesperson how to comment on Russia's import of more than 20 million US dollars worth of high-tech precision instruments from Taiwan for the production of advanced drones? The Foreign Ministry spokesperson said that he was not aware of the situation, but Russia adheres to the one-China principle and firmly opposes "Taiwan independence."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a video commentary of "Overheard" has resonated with many netizens. Some people asked "Why did the Germans have the courage to tear down the Berlin Wall" and "I feel like I was there." Some people even took over the "Glory to Hong Kong"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 4, dozens of sanitation workers in Xiayi County, Henan Province, went to the local Finance Bureau to ask for their wages. The Finance Bureau said that the money had been transferred to the Urban Management Bureau at noon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 3, a mixed-cut video of "You Are Not Really Happy" triggered strong emotions and resonance among netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
So far, the U.S. Embassy in China's blog post "Protecting Giraffes" has received 16,000 reposts, 136,000 comments, and 627,000 likes.
However, the comments directly attacking the Pyramid Tower have basically disappeared from the current comment area, replaced by a large number of "Long live the friendship between China and the United States" and "I love China".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 4, Guiyang
A mother said that her child was deceived by his classmates to Myanmar and demanded a ransom of 200,000 yuan. So she asked the real estate developer and the property to return the rent owed to her so that she could redeem her son.
The police came and expressed sympathy to her after understanding the situation and persuaded her not to disturb public order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: From the evening of February 3 to the 4th, due to heavy snow, thousands of vehicles were trapped on the Wuhan-Jingzhou section of the highway for dozens of hours. People used crowbars and hammers to break the ice to save themselves and burned branches to keep warm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that the snow on the same highway in Henan was cleared very cleanly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 4, migrant workers in Jianyang District, Nanping City, Fujian Province, held up banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Guiyang fire, netizens from all over the country posted comments saying that the fire hydrants in their own building corridors were also broken.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 4, many markets in Zhangjiajie City were suspected to have collapsed due to snow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 4, a large number of passengers were stranded at Wuhan High-Speed Railway Station due to heavy snow.
